decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:
100;101 survey plan; 101 Site Block Plan; 102; 103; 
104;105 Rev A; 106 Rev B;107 Rev A; Location Plan; 
Reasonable Exception Statement; Ecological Appraisal 
(Dated: June 2023); Design and Access Statement; 121; 120; 
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - The roof area of the deeper single storey rear extension (to the right, when viewed  from the rear garden), hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The window(s) in the side elevation of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.


REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 7 - Prior to construction of any works above DPC level, the applicant will provide to the Council for approval in writing plans for:
       i    the incorporation of three Schwegler FR2 bat tubes (or similarly                      durable, functional equivalents), to be installed side-by-side so as to                facilitate animals' movement between them, within the fabric of the two           storey extension at just below roof eaves level on its southern aspect.
     ii.   the installation of a Schwegler SP1 Sparrow Terrace (or similarly            durable, functional equivalent) at just below roof eaves level on the             southern half of the eastern aspect of the building.
The applicant will install the wildlife shelters as agreed as part of the approved construction and thereafter retain them in functional condition, ensuring that access ways and entrances remain clear. 
REASON: For the purposes of proper planning, to minimise uncertainty and to protect and enhance the natural environment in accordance with local plan policies DM 20 and DM21 and the provisions of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single and two storey rear extension with balcony at first floor level; two storey side extension; replacement, alterations and extension to roof; rear dormer; external steps to rear; external alterations
